R0048.title: Facial Recognition Bypass
R0048.definition: Bypassing facial recognition by forging or tampering with facial data or related authentication data.
R0048.description: Bypassing facial recognition by forging or tampering with facial data or related authentication data. Commonly used in login, payment, and other processes, or as one of the factors in multi-factor authentication.
R0048.influence: Facial recognition mechanisms become ineffective, leading to unauthorized login, payment, and other risks.

references.title: A Brief Overview of Facial Recognition Technology and Attack Techniques
